mapper.insert:
insert into review (user_id, product_name, title, text, date, shopping_list, grade, state, img, site, img_count) values
(#{review.user_id}, #{review.product_name}, #{review.title}, #{review.text}, #{review.date}, #{review.shopping_list}, #{review.grade}, #{review.state}, #{review.img}, #{review.site}, #{review.img_count})
